Lets play

Games are what got me into programming! I love games and as an educator use games in my teaching. I started to create different games with in digital formats. Here you can check out a selection of games created mostly on the front-end using vanilla javascript

Some of the pages within this portfolio are styled with Bootstrap, some with Tailwind.

42 the game

A solitaire version of the boardgame "The Mind". In my version you play with numbers from 0-42 and 14 positions. You have to successfully position each random number in ascending order. If you position all 14 numbers correctly you win!
